an5.214:4.3: Musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, pharusaṃ bhaṇati, samphappalāpaṃ bhaṇati, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5.214:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā bahubhāṇismiṃ puggale.
an5.214:5.3: Na musā bhaṇati, na pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, na pharusaṃ bhaṇati, na samphappalāpaṃ bhaṇati, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5.214:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā mantabhāṇismiṃ puggale”ti.
